title.rendered: Vote for Our Rockstar! + Textbooks + Warehouse

content.rendered:
Vote for Christy for Robins Regional Rockstar!

Each year the Robins Regional Chamber recognizes the efforts of employees in the Robins Region who are making a positive impact on their workplace and the people they serve.  This award (formerly named Employee of the Year) seeks to honor people in business who make our days a little brighter or an experience a little more enjoyable. They are passionate about their work and they love the Robins Region. This year Christy Rozier, an employee for Gottwals Books for the past five years, is one of the Rockstar finalists! Check out this video: https://www.facebook.com/Robinsregion/videos/1231349003584988/

And vote for Christy here: http://www.robinsregion.com/poll/rockstars/

 

Sell Your School Books for Cash!

Bring your textbooks in for cash… It’s quick and easy and we pay more than you’ll ever get from your campus bookstore!

 

Bulk School Book Orders

Many teachers and school districts have discovered the benefits of placing their orders (both large and small) with Gottwals Books. We have relationships with multiple distributors and warehouses, allowing us to offer the lowest prices of any other book vendor. We are even cheaper than buying online!

 

Warehouse Update

Shelves and HVAC are being installed at the new Gottwals Books/Walls of Books headquarters in Byron, GA!

 

Fat Brain Toys

Fat Brain Toys are at Gottwals Books! This family owned and operated company produces high-quality toys that develop visual/spatial skills in children. Come explore these educational and colorful products.
